channel.title: design on Anna Vlassova
channel.description: Recent content in design on Anna Vlassova

item.title: Adventure Playground for St. Albert's Primary School
item.description: Materials: Reclaimed wood, climbing holds cast with recycled plastic. Community build project with Rags to Riches, Glasgow.

item.title: Jesmonite Bedside Table
item.description: Materials: Jesmonite, recycled plastic chips, reclaimed 18mm birch plywood. Made in collaboration with William Nelson for Rags to Riches, Glasgow.

item.title: Jesmonite Coffee Table
item.description: Materials: Jesmonite, recycled plastic chips, reclaimed 18mm birch plywood, metal bolt inserts. Flatpack design. Can be assembled and disassembled for transportation. Made in collaboration with William Nelson for Rags to Riches, Glasgow.

item.title: Laminated Coffee Table
item.description: Materials: Laminated top made of scrap wood and jesmonite with recycled plastic chips. Legs made with scrap pine and detachable metal inserts. Flatpack design. Can be assembled and disassembled for transportation. Made in collaboration with William Nelson for Rags to Riches, Glasgow.

item.title: Milking Stool
item.description: Materials: Reclaimed Scottish larch, naturally stained. Made for Rags to Riches, Glasgow.

item.title: Piano Stool
item.description: Materials: Tulipwood, copper, hand-embroidered upholstered seat. Dimensions: H 500 x W 556 x D 380mm

item.title: Workshop Entrance Sign
item.description: Materials: Reclaimed wood, laser cut sign, selection of boards showcasing wood work techniques such as veneer, lamination, carving etc.

item.title: Cherry Side Table
item.description: 2021 Hand carved cherry side table with maple legs.

item.title: Desk With Adjustable Shelves
item.description: Length 1.95m, Depth 0.6m, Height 0.7m 24mm Birch Plywood shelves from 12mm plywood and recycled wood Made with hand tools and finished with Osmo Hardwax Oil Clear Satin Finish

item.title: Desk With Bookshelves
item.description: 2021 Pine shelf and desk frame with Birch plywood top and shelves.
